title: Urgot CAN NOT BE RELEASED

embed.description: Literally one shotting everything! Amazing Bug! ➤ Send me your replays here: vandiril88@gmail.com ➤ Become a member/sponsor: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ-oWkpMnHjTJpeOOlD80OA/join ➤ Follow me on Twitch, Twitter, Facebook, Discord and Subreddit! http://www.twitch.tv/vandiril https://twitter.com/vandiril https://www.facebook.com/Vandiril https://discord.gg/Vandiril https://www.reddit.com/r/vandiril/ I'm part of the official League Partner Program with Riot Games.

body: If you release this to live server... You will have everyone rage quit the game.... Maybe that's your goal? or that's a troll test going out. Not sure.? But you should really rethink your decision devs… this is getting out of hand...

replies.body:
It’s like the Super Monkey upgrades from Bloons TD.

Don’t worry, they’ll fix it before it goes live.  This is just Vandiril having fun with a PBE bug.
:p yeah they fixed it. I am on PBE as well was fun for a whole 5 games then I got bored of it. but it was stupid broken

If we ban macros it's gonna be fine.
I think.
Not sure
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
